name: KoreanPoliticalFighters: 2ND
description:
This game was never made for political purposes. The life stories of politicians in the work are all fiction.
Korean Political Figures: 2ND is a fighting game featuring a Korean politician who inherited a mobile game of the same name.
Choose the politician you support and be reborn as the strongest.

One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.

The role of politicians in the ruined world is gone.
Now the only way they can prove themselves is to fight.



controller is required for local multiplayer
Find the strongest politician to represent you and engage in the Korean largest political battle.
